content: > **pattern update ** as of september 30th 2022 there is a fresh new update for our simple sock pattern the update includes a fresh layout new photos and lots of extra tips and tricks making this even more beginner friendly there is even a bonus colouring in page included in the download section to help you plan your colours these simple socks are an easy introduction for new sock knitters or a basic vanilla sock for those that know what they are doing the socks are worked from the toe up using circular needles and magic loop and have a mitred short row heel there may be some new techniques that you will need to look up but they will be a great addition to your knitting toolkit **sizes ** one size for width of sock with suggestions for length as follows eur size 36 38 40 or 22 5 24 25 cm or knit them whatever length you like **yarn ** any 4ply / fingering weight sock yarn we used lang jawoll sock 210m/50g in 3 colours but you can use as many or as few colours as you like **quantity ** approximately 40-80g total depending on foot and leg length **needle ** 2 25-2 50mm 80cm circular needles depending on your gauge if you are a tight knitter use 2 50mm or a looser knitter try 2 25 **gauge ** roughly 36 sts x 48-50 row to 10cm in stocking stitch **materials ** yarn needle for sewing in ends 1 locking stitch marker or safety pin for marking front of sock optional for optional pom pom xs pom pom maker or a fork and scissors **techniques used** * judy s magic cast on * magic loop * german short row heel * i used this 1 stretchy sewn bind off but a decrease bind off or jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off work fine too * if you d like to add some cute mini pom pom s to the back of your sock like ours we have a handy tutorial over on our website 2 * remember it is easy to customise the length of your socks just knit the leg or foot longer or shorter for a baby sock version you can find our pattern over here 3 yarn used in original sample is wren & ollie sock in nymph and juniper and in 2022 sample is lang jawoll sock in 0228 0246 and 0372 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=fnbanlvzbxw&t=52s 2 https //makermakerstore
